channel.title: [PI] Help adding different races(elves,dwarfs etc) [PI]
channel.description:
well im adding different races to my server like your able to pick to be elves, dwarfs etc via character creation screen, i need help adding the button to the char creation interface and also i need help adding different body parts.
i added the ability to resize character via client i could edit it to make it change size via race myself.
Rep++ for person who helps.
